item.title: About me
item.description: Education Software Engineering (International), Faculty of Engineering, King Mongkut’s Institute of Technology Ladkrabang. Technical Skills I should get around to writing this part. Site under construction! This site was built using hugo and a slightly modified coder theme.

item.title: SenseStack
item.description: Sense stack is a IoT sensor platform for environmental data collection. I was the firmware developer for the project. I’ll add more details as I have time. This site is still under construction!
